item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Default Ruleset 2.2 in WAF for Azure Application Gateway
item.description:
Microsoft announced the general availability of Default Rule Set (DRS) 2.2 for Web Application Firewall (WAF) on Azure Application Gateway. The Azure-managed rule set provides active protection against common web vulnerabilities and exploits and includes Microsoft Threat Intelligence.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: security: Investigating targeted “payroll pirate” attacks affecting US universities
item.description:
Microsoft Threat Intelligence reports a financially motivated actor tracked as Storm-2657 conducting “payroll pirate” attacks against US universities by compromising employee accounts, accessing employee profiles, and diverting salary payments to attacker-controlled accounts.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog

item.title: security: AI vs. AI: Detecting an AI-obfuscated phishing campaign
item.description:
Microsoft Threat Intelligence detected and blocked a credential-phishing campaign that likely used AI-generated code to obfuscate its payload and evade traditional defenses, highlighting a trend of attackers leveraging AI and the need for defenders to anticipate and adapt to AI-driven threats.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog
